arguments.value: User not registered or already r

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "User not registered or already revoked"

arguments.value: User not registered or already revoked

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "User not registered or already revoked"

devdoc.details: As described in the project specification. This contract manages user identities for a passwordless authentication system. It stores a public key (or metadata) and an active status for each user address.

getPublicKey(address).details: Retrieves the stored public key string for a given user.

returns._0: string The public key or metadata string.

isUserActive(address).details: Checks if a user is registered and currently active. This is the primary function the backend will call.

params._user: The address of the user to check.

returns._0: bool True if the user is active, false otherwise.

registerUser(string).details: Registers a new user or re-registers an inactive user. The public key is provided as a string. This could be metadata or a full PEM-encoded public key.

params._publicKey: The public key or metadata string to associate with the user.

revokeUser().details: Revokes a user's access. This can only be called by the user themselves, acting as a self-service "disable account" or "revoke key" function.

devdoc.title: AuthChain
